get.description: To get sla metrics like violationcount , successcount , breachtime, fullfilltime.Other params include - departmentId(list of department ids separated by commas.When departmentId is not given,data for all department is given),agentId(list of agent ids separated by commas.When agentId is not given,data for all agents is given),slaId(list of sla ids separated by commas.When slaId is not given,data for all sla is given),duration,startDate,endDate and channel.
